name: Cloudedge
0:
”Alexa, show the camera”
”Alexa, hide the doorbell”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Cloudedge skill can only work with certain AC powered Wi-Fi cameras, not all cameras using Cloudedge APP can use Cloudedge skill, please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Cloudedge App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Cloudedge App, keep it online and running.
2. Find Cloudedge Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
